question: After Emergency, elections were held in 1977, Out of 42 MP seats, congress won 41 and only one MP seat was won by Neelam Sanjeev Reddy from Janta party. From which constituency he won the seat?
explanation: After Emergency elections were held in 1977, Out of 42 MP seats, congress won 41 and only one MP seat from Nandyal was won by Neelam Sanjeev Reddy from Janta party.
